discourse_list.title: Growth Opportunity: Second-largets US Mortgage Lender To Accept Cryptocurrency

content.content: US Mortgage Giant To Accept Bitcoin This Year, Considers Other Cryptocurrencies   Second-largest United States mortgage lender UWM Holdings Corp’s (NYSE: UWMC) United Wholesale Mortgage plans to start accepting cryptocurrency payments this year, starting with Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC). He said that “hopefully (this year) we can actually execute on that before anyone in the country.” Isbia added that they are “starting with Bitcoin” but they are also "looking at Ethereum and others.”  Might be worth reaching out to them. It would be exciting if Dai were the first stablecoin they accepted for mortgage payments!
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the announcement made by United Wholesale Mortgage, the second-largest US mortgage lender, to start accepting cryptocurrency payments, starting with Bitcoin, and possibly Ethereum and others. The post suggests that it would be exciting if Dai were the first stablecoin they accepted for mortgage payments and encourages reaching out to them.

content.content: Spidomo:  UWM Holdings Corp’s   That is a great idea.

In analogy with buying a Tesla, it makes no sense at all to use BTC or ETH to pay your mortgage off. Any stablecoin makes way more sense and getting DAI to be the first in that queue would be pretty awesome!
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
